Message:
I remained by that human’s side
to expose his true nature.

But, it seems I no longer
need to do that...
Now then, what am I to do next?

He does not become angry
when I play pranks on him,
and he even gives me food.

Also, whenever he smiles at me,
for some reason,
I feel warmth inside my heart...

I have no reasons
to leave his side.
Rather, I only have
reasons why I cannot.

Well, if that is the case,
I guess it does not trouble me.

I do not really have any goals,
so I might as well stay by his side
and bask in this warmth a little longer...

I am the infamous mononoke
and mightiest guardian spirit.
The world exists for my sake.

Naturally, the place at your side
belongs to me too, Master,
as I have decided so.
I shall yield it to no one!

Heh-heh! You had best do
as much as possible to ensure
that I am not bored, Master.

Well, it does not seem to
be a concern for now...

’Tis because,
despite how I appear,
my devotion is unmatched.
Heh-heh...!
